Soil خاک

These materials are designed to assist vocational instructors, professors, and extension workers in planning and implementing agricultural lessons. Unlike other materials on e-Afghan Ag, these materials assume some prior knowledge of agriculture. For a more practical approach to Soil, please visit the Natural Resource Management tab on the blue bar above.

Content

  • Overview

  • Material from the Laboratory of Jerry Peters (Purdue) unless noted otherwise.
